direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods deal with futures accounts and return related information, but futuresAccountSummary provides a summary.
Both methods are related to futures accounts and provide information about them, but futuresPositionRisk focuses on position risk.
Both methods involve futures operations and have similar parameter handling and control flow.
Both methods modify the state of a futures account, but enableFutures activates the futures feature.

enhanced_by.reason: The futures feature must be enabled before querying the futures account details.
Transferring assets internally might be a prerequisite for querying the futures account details.
The summary method can be used to verify the correctness of the futures account details returned by futuresAccount.
